ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,Pete Costanza,John Rosenberger,Pete Costanza,John Rosenberger,Ogden Whitney
ComicInfo.Title: The Hand of the Unknown!; A Matter of Identity!; Strange Words on Stone!; Elmer Gets the Most Striking Dates!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Hand of the Unknown!: Is the house haunted, or is it all in her head? Andy Markson of the Institute of Psychic Phenomena investigates.
A Matter of Identity!: Comrade Dmitri Simenov learns what it is like to be erased from history.
Strange Words on Stone!: Found: stone tablets with the oldest written language in the world.
Elmer Gets the Most Striking Dates!: Elmer Truffle gets into a bet with a buddy that he will get the most striking date to go to the Spring Hop with him.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved By The Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Carmichael,Andy Markson,Shane O'Shea (headshot),Rebecca Ainsley,Pete Costanza (headshot),Chief,Paul Ainsley
